title: Evoke Prediction Schema v1
description: Expected input of the evoke-prediction-create-job function

prefix.description: This is prefix to the model identifier to create the job identifier

workflow.description: This is the run number of the prediction workflow

name.description: Identifies a machine learning model in Vertex Model Registry, e.g. red-donkey

pose.description: This does not influence the images being generated. If supplied, this can describe the specific pose the model is trained to generate; this later becomes metadata of each generated image.

count.description: The number of images to generate.

shuffle.description: A seed used by a pRNG to shuffle prompts, expressed as a string, defaulting to "evoke".  This is NOT the seed used by Stable Diffusion.

seeds.description: Numerical seed[s] used by Stable Diffusion during image generation.

guidance.description: CFG value used by Stable Diffusion during image generation.

steps.description: Number of inference steps used by Stable Diffusion during image generation.

tokens.description: Caption describing the DreamBooth object.  This becomes part of the positive prompt shared amongst all generated images.

negative.description: Fragments comprising the negative prompt shared amongst all generated images.

styles.description: Restricts the list of styles used for prompt generation.

environments.description: Restricts the list of environments used for prompt generation.

modifiers.description: Restricts the list of modifiers used for prompt generation.
